title: Interpretation of a louse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and prominent scholars

preview.html:
html

Dreaming of lice causes anxiety and worry for many, prompting them to seek an interpretation of this vision. This vision has many different meanings and interpretations for you, and many scholars have interpreted it as enemies of the dreamer, but they are weak and unable to cope. Sometimes it can symbolize that you are going through some material problems, especially if you let them go without killing them, and we will tell you through this article about all the clues that the vision carries.

Lice in a dream

Imam al-Assimy says that catching lice during pregnancy and getting rid of it without killing it is a sign that you will face many problems and crises in life, but you will be able to get rid of them soon.

Lice in a dream for a sick person is an indication of the severe pain and suffering that the dreamer feels because of the disease, but he will recover from it soon.

Many lice in a dream are an indication that there are many enemies and envious people against you, but at the same time they are weak and unable to deal with you.

Lice in a dream for Ibn Sirin

  • Says Ibn Sirin that lice in a dream are a symbol of a weak enemy, but he is one of your relatives. As for reading a biography about new clothes , it means that you are indebted and suffering from serious crises.
  • To dream of lice and kill them in a sick person's dream is a praiseworthy vision and a sign of a speedy recovery from the disease.
  • Dreaming of lice without getting rid of them is a contemptible vision and indicates an increase in financial judgments or making quick decisions that result in many mistakes.
  • Lice in a dream are a sign of distress and health problems if they are black and large in size.
  • Lice coming out of the body and not the hair, says Ibn Sirin in this regard, that it is a sign of the short life of the seer and his death soon, as well as the difficult life that is full of crises until the end. From the term because it is one of the afflicted visions.
  • Lice that hurt the head or suck blood from it are a sign that there is an evil person in your life who will cause you many problems and take away your livelihood and money without your knowledge.

Lice in an unmarried woman's dream

  • Killing lice in the dream of an unmarried woman is a vision that shows kindness and salvation from problems and troubles in life, and in the vision it is a sign of getting rid of enemies.
  • Seeing lice walking on the bed is a praiseworthy vision and indicates marriage and engagement soon, if you are not afraid of it. The vision may also indicate that more than one young man has proposed to her, while she feels confused and unable to choose.
  • Seeing a large number of lice on the head is an indication that there are many relatives around you, but they hate you and are plotting mischief for you, and you must confront them and be distinguished.
  • Being bitten by a louse on the head means that someone is trying to tarnish your reputation and participate in your show, and this vision can also express failure in studies if the girl is a science student.
  • A dream of many lice walking in the hair is a vision that warns of financial losses and the accumulation of debts, and the vision can also express a multitude of sins and transgressions, and the girl must repent and return to God.

Removing lice from the hair in a dream for an unmarried woman

  • Removing lice from the hair in a dream of an unmarried woman is a vision that indicates getting rid of bad friends and inappropriate people in her life.
  • Removing lice in a dream for an engaged woman is an indication of an approaching marriage, and in the vision it is an indication of satisfying desires and a life of happiness and stability.
  • Seeing the removal of lice and killing them in a dream of an unmarried woman is a good omen for getting rid of problems and major fears, in addition to indicating that she will get rid of the obstacles she faces on an emotional and practical level.

A large louse in a dream for an unmarried woman

A large louse in the dream of an unmarried woman is a sign of being subjected to injustice and slander from those around her, and as for her falling from the head, it is an improvement in circumstances and a sign of stability in all aspects of life.

Ibn Shaheen says that seeing lice that are large and black is an indication that the virgin girl is going through a major problem that affects her psychological state, and getting rid of it is a material gain.

Lice in a dream for a married woman

  • If the woman is suffering from a disease and sees lice in her dream, it means that the disease will be serious and will last for a long time.
  • Dreaming of many lice for a woman who does not give birth is good news from God that she will soon become pregnant.
  • Says Ibn Sirin that lice coming out of a married woman's hair, and their number is multiplied, is an indication that there are many problems in her life, as well as a symbol of envy or a boy with bad qualities.

What is the interpretation of seeing lice in a married woman's hair?

Lice in a married woman's hair are an indication of not adhering to the teachings of religion and straying from the straight path, and the vision also expresses instability in marital life and the existence of many problems between her and her husband, according to what. Assimy showed in his interpretation.

Dream interpretation of Lice in the hair and killing them for a married woman

  • Lawyers say that dreaming of killing lice in a married woman's hair is a dream that brings her a lot of good. If she is suffering from financial problems, this vision is a good omen to get rid of them.
  • Killing many lice means that the married woman will get a lot of money , either through her husband's promotion or through acquiring a legitimate inheritance.
  • Killing lice in a married woman's dream, which al-Nabulsi says is an indication of getting rid of problems and difficulties, in addition to achieving the goals she aspires to.
  • Black lice in a married woman's dream are an expression of the calamities that will befall her, and she should pray and draw closer to God Almighty for the good of circumstances so that this period passes, and she should read the Qur'an a lot.

Lice in a dream for a pregnant woman

  • An pregnant woman who sees many lice in her hair while removing it and cleaning her hair means that she is trying to get rid of bad people around her.
  • Lice biting means that there are evil men in the lady's life.
  • Ibn Shaheen says that dreaming of lice in a pregnant woman's dream is an indication that her offspring will be female.
  • The killing of lice in the dream of an pregnant woman is an expression of ease of childbirth and happiness in life.

Dream interpretation of lice and nits in the hair of an pregnant woman

To see lice and nits in the hair of an pregnant woman , which Ibn Sirin says is an increase in the troubles and problems she faces, and the vision may be a sign of being subjected to great evil, but from friends and relatives.

Killing lice and nits in a dream of an pregnant woman represents liberation from worries and problems, and if they are present in clothes, it means bad friends, but she cannot escape them.

Lice in a dream for a divorced woman

Lice in a divorced woman's dream are an indication that she is suffering from serious psychological damage as a result of the separation.

Lice in a dream for a divorced woman indicate that she has lost her provider and that she is going through many troubles, and the dream may be psychological resulting from excessive thinking about the future and worry about...

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a burning car

preview.text: Seeing a burning car in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and other interpretations that we will explain for the single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, divorced woman or man, the meaning of a burning car or a car burning in front of me, or the car catching fire and extinguishing it, or the car engine burning, or a car explosion, according to Ibn Sirin, and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a car fire in a dream Seeing a burning car in a dream indicates that the person is facing some problems in his professional life and an increase in the amount of money he will spend, and seeing a burning car in a dream means that this person will be exposed to a disaster or a situation where he is very sad. Seeing a burning car in a dream means that the person will face some financial problems and go through some crises in his professional life in the future, as it also indicates the difficulty of succeeding in his work. Anyone who sees a burning car in a dream means the emergence of some defects in the dreamer's possessions, he may be robbed, or some things may be taken from him and not returned, or something like that. The car fire indicates problems in private life, such as heated arguments between spouses, and sometimes expresses committing sins or sins. The car that was in an accident in a dream and burns represents a loss of property or loss of money or exposure to bankruptcy. If you dreamed that your car was burning in your dream, this dream has a symbolic meaning, as the car itself is a reflection of the dreamer's physical and mental state, and any damage to the car means some problems in the person's life. At the same time, when something burns in a dream, this is a clear sign of losing energy and wasting efforts in vain, and this interpretation is especially true if it was your car and not someone else's. Burning a car in a dream symbolizes a lack of emotional tenderness and a lack of romance and gentle treatment from the beloved. These things are a direct indication that you need to completely change your behavior, otherwise you will face major problems. But if the car in your dream has pure and clean fire, this dream means positive developments in the relationship with the beloved and spiritual growth in the relationship. If the burning car you saw in your dream was parked near your home, you should be prepared for scandals and misunderstandings in your home, and the burning car can also predict the complete failure of some endeavors. The dream can also have a positive meaning, a burning car symbolizes the recognition of the spirit and its purification, and getting rid of old habits and behaviors that poison your life. If you dream that your car is burning, you should expect change and joy for others and general well-being, but only after some problems arise and you face obstacles. The burning car can also predict a new project that will bring a lot of worries and problems, but it will achieve profit and success. But if the fire engulfed an old car in your dream, this means that old problems will end, but if the fire engulfed the car because of a traffic accident, you will soon have to deal with a stupid person. Dream interpreter Miller says that a car accident and fire, if seen in a dream, are a symbol of a long-awaited event that will end in scandal. Fire in a dream often symbolizes love adventures and passion, and if you see your car burning after an accident, you should expect romance to disappear from your life for a while and then reappear. Seeing a car burning from both sides in a dream means a strong wave of emotion. And if you set fire to the car in a dream, this means that you will accept a reckless act. But if you see in your dream that you are putting out a car fire, this means that the emotional turmoil in your life will fade one after the other. Dreaming of driving a burning car means unavoidable events. If you witness a car accident and then see a fire, this means that your dreams and hopes will fail. If you dream that the car is on fire and firefighters are trying to put it out, the materials you gather will be the best weapon against your enemy. And if they are unable to put out the fire, you may lose your chance and the villains will turn against you to become stronger and more cunning than you. Interpretation of a burning car in a dream Seeing a burning car in a dream is a symbol of progress and advancement and an indication that you are worried about a situation or decision, and the vision means that you need some feelings from your loved one, and the vision is evidence that there are some situations that need your attention and immediate intervention so that you can deal with them and find solutions to them. Your dream that the car is burning ultimately represents completion and a new beginning, a new transition and evidence that you are reaping some positive energy. Seeing a burning car in your dream is a hint at something or someone you favor and an indication that you tend to do your best to help those in need. If you see that the car is burning in a dream, this means that you should ignore some things that seem insignificant in life, and this dream shows the evolutionary aspect of your personality and proves that you need to get to know some feelings and kind aspects of yourself. The dream of a burning car shows your inability to care for your family and that you should be more self-sufficient instead of relying on others, and the vision is a sign that you feel wronged by someone. Dreaming of a burning car means your negative feelings about a situation or event that you don't like and will try to change. Dreaming of a burning car means that you are concerned about your future and the way you live and the amount of money you get. The presence of the car in this dream indicates your future travel plans and an indication that you are trying to express an idea in a way that others can understand. This dream shows that you tend to be self-reliant and you will not let your emotions stand in the way of your decisions, this dream is a harbinger of a desire or obsession inside you for someone. Also, this particular vision means that you are dealing with thoughts and habits that need to be re-examined by you and not to be drawn to act according to the heart and not the mind. Dreaming of burning a car is a sign of excess, wealth and decadence, and evidence that you are going through new changes and a change in the course of your life, and the vision means that you feel that you are restricted from your ability to express yourself. Semantically The burning of the car in a dream In your emotional and expressive energy, evidence that you can maintain your positive energy in a variety of social situations and blend in with any situation with ease. Dreaming of a burning car is an indicator of what you should do in your life, evidence that you are being deceived about certain matters, and the vision is an indicator that you are in complete control of a situation or relationship. This dream also shows your willingness and determination to do something, and the dream shows that you are a straightforward person who can be trusted by anyone...

title: The Interpretation of an Infant in a Dream According to Ibn Sirin

preview.text:
Seeing a baby breastfeeding in a dream is one of those visions that bring joy to hearts and make them smile. It is a blessed and reassuring vision for most people, as a baby symbolizes purity, a new beginning, kindness, and blessings.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream according to Ibn Sirin**

However, interpretations vary and are numerous based on the dreamer's social status, the circumstances they are going through, and the events of the vision they saw. In this article, we will list the different interpretations of seeing a baby in a dream.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream**

The interpretation of a baby in a dream varies according to the events of the dream. If the baby is beautiful and calm, as is usual for babies, then this indicates kindness, blessings, the arrival of happiness, joy, and pleasure.  Seeing a baby in a dream means that good will come in the near future. 

The interpretation of seeing a baby crying in a dream is different from seeing a baby that is quiet. This indicates worries and problems on a professional level. However, if the baby in the vision was born prematurely (born before nine months), this indicates a new project or that the dreamer is planning to start a project. A dead baby indicates loss, sadness, and severe pain, but if a person sees that he is beating a baby in a dream, this means that he has wronged someone and must stop this injustice.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream according to Ibn Sirin**

Ibn Sirin stated that seeing a baby breastfeeding in a dream means comfort, ease, and a way out of difficulties and crises, whether they are financial crises such as poverty, debts, or the loss of a project, or psychological crises such as anxiety, worry, sadness, and suffering. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin pointed out that seeing a baby in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness. If the dreamer sees that he has a son, this is evidence of livelihood and good solutions. If he sees himself as a returning infant, this indicates foolishness and that the dreamer is characterized by a weak personality and improper thinking about many issues in his life.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq**

Imam al-Sadiq interpreted the vision of a baby in a dream as comfort, good tidings, and salvation. If the dreamer is an unmarried girl, this means that she will get married or be proposed to in the near future. If this baby is beautiful, this is evidence that she will marry someone she loves or a boy of her dreams.

However, if a married woman sees this vision, it indicates that the desires and aspirations that she has long dreamed of and demanded will be realized soon. For a man who sees this vision, it is a clear sign that he is starting a new life, such as marriage or starting a new project. If the dreamer is suffering from stress or sadness, this is salvation for him from their worries and an escape from those worries.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream for a single woman**

If an unmarried woman sees a baby in a dream, this indicates the approaching of a new matter related to marriage, work, or studies. If this baby is beautiful and lovely, this indicates her marriage to a young man who loves and cherishes her, and that she will live a happy married life with him.

On the contrary, if the unmarried girl does not remember the baby's shape, this may indicate anxiety, sadness, and misery that befall her.

**Interpretation of a crying baby in a dream for a single woman**

Seeing a crying baby in the dream of an unmarried woman is generally a bad or unfavorable vision because of the implications and signs that this vision carries. If an unmarried girl is seen trying to comfort the baby, make him laugh, or play with him, this indicates her ability to deal with these problems and her ability to overcome the obstacles she faces in general.

The baby's excessive crying may also indicate that her marriage has been delayed to some extent, but if he cries then laughs, this indicates the fulfillment of our desires and aspirations and the abundance of her livelihood.

**Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream for a married woman**

Seeing a baby breastfeeding in a dream for a married woman generally indicates good and livelihood that will come to her, as well as the ability to live that she and her husband will face. The vision may also indicate that she is very worried about her husband and family, but if this baby is a male, it indicates an upcoming inheritance that she will receive soon. If the baby is female, it indicates an ability to live or the possibility of the marriage of one of her relatives or children.

The crying of a breastfeeding baby in the dream of a married woman indicates that the enemies around her are plotting against her and harbor hatred and envy in their hearts towards her. It may also indicate that she is facing a financial or psychological crisis and many problems with her husband.

**Interpretation of adopting a baby in a dream for a married woman**

Some commentators say that seeing this dream for a married woman is not a good interpretation. It may indicate her sadness and anxiety about finding it. It is also likely to indicate a deterioration in her health and illness, but if she sees that she is adopting a baby and refuses to go with her, this indicates that her circumstances will deteriorate and she will face problems that may last for a long time. It can also indicate her intense pursuit of something that troubles her.

**Interpretation of seeing a baby vomit in a dream for a married woman**

This vision is one of the disturbing visions for everyone, as it carries bad implications and tidings, whether for the dreamer or for the baby if it is known in reality. The vision generally indicates difficulties, hardships, and pressures in life. It also indicates the instability of her social relationships and the lack of a strong bond between her and her acquaintances. If the breastfeeding baby vomits on the married woman's clothes in a dream, this indicates sins or transgressions that she has committed and must repent from. As for if this baby is her son, this indicates that she is prone to envy.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream for a pregnant woman**

Seeing a baby in a dream for a pregnant woman is often an indication of the gender of the child she will give birth to. If she sees a girl, she will give birth to a boy. 

In general, this vision indicates an easy delivery and her preoccupation with her due date.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream for a divorced woman**

Seeing a baby breastfeeding in a dream for a divorced woman indicates the cessation of anxiety, sadness, and misery, and the transformation of her life for the better. The vision also indicates the possibility of marrying a righteous and truthful man and living a happy married life with him. However, if she sees that she is giving birth from her ex-husband, this is a sign that she will return to him and live a good life with him.

**Interpretation of a baby in a dream for a man**

Seeing a man breastfeeding in a dream is a good vision because it means livelihood, kindness, and success in all aspects of life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing the dead screaming in a dream means committing forbidden acts, losing sustenance, and other interpretations that we will explain for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man. Like seeing the dead screaming, or the dead angry, or the deceased father screaming in my face, or the dead person screaming in the grave for Ibn Sirin, and others in the continuity of the topic: The interpretation of the dead screaming in a dream. Instant translators say that the voice of a person in a dream generally shows his condition in life and his report among people, whether good or bad. Relief that comes after hardship and sorrows, but the screaming of the dead in a dream differs in its interpretation from the screaming of a living person. The dream, the vision, shows the bad state of this deceased person and his critical and not good state after his death, and that he needs the help of his family in praying for him and paying expenses so that he may attain the satisfaction of Allah, the Almighty, and attain his forgiveness and mercy. Crying can be seen in a dream as screaming in some cases. And if it is accompanied by a loud voice and tears, then it indicates bad conditions, worries, anxiety and disasters. This can indicate poverty and illness. Conditions are at their best and find a way to happiness and peace, but the crying of the dead does not differ in its interpretation from howling, whether it is accompanied by tears or not, it is an indication of the sadness that that dead person is going through after his work is cut off from this world and his feeling of deep remorse. It is also a sign of his bad state and condition. Seeing a dead person screaming is evidence of spreading rumors and also tells you that it is time to listen to yourself and make decisions according to your opinion and not according to the opinions of others. Hearing the screams of the dead in a dream means that you are suffering from some emotional disturbances, your feelings are not clear about a situation or a person. The screaming of the dead in a dream also indicates the ups and downs of life and the emergence of changes and proves that there are many opportunities available to you to move forward in your life and achieve great successes. The screaming of the dead in your dream indicates your need to free yourself from a routine or old idea or a previous relationship and tells you that you need to be more serious in your approach to a problem or task or situation. The screaming of the dead means that you need to improve your pace and learn to adapt to the environment and situations. This dream is related to your leadership skills, personality and the beauty of your presence in front of others. It also tells you that you may be afraid to get close to a relationship or situation. Dreaming of a dead person screaming is a sign of challenge and that you should stop relying on others. The screaming of the dead in a dream This dream indicates unresolved problems with your friend or unresolved problems in your childhood that you need to deal with. The dream also tells you that you may face some situations that require you to follow a way of relaxation and patience to overcome them. The screaming of the dead in a dream is evidence of the unrecognized or apparent aspects of your personality, and the dream also tells you that you are a good person and do things without expecting anything in return from others. Seeing the dead screaming in your dream means that you should be careful in your behavior and dealings with others so that they do not take advantage of you, and this dream is a hint of an event or problem that will happen soon. You will feel discomfort due to the stress caused by this problem and you should be more open and accept the opinions and ideas of others because you may get help from others so that you can overcome this problem successfully. Dreaming of a dead person screaming Sometimes it indicates your abilities and creativity and proves that you, unfortunately, let others control you too much. The dream may have another meaning, which is that you are like an open book. Everyone can know your next destination, how you think, how you decide. Perhaps you should be more mysterious so that you are not too easy in front of others. The dream also shows your desire for harmony in your life and tells you that you are surrounded by friends and family, and it also indicates that you are making successful efforts and working hard and devoting yourself to achieving your goals. The dead screaming at you in a dream may make you feel controlled and manipulated by others. You are hiding your opinions and decisions and not acting on them. Your dream tells you to be more strict about giving your consent to the matter in which your consent will be taken. Hearing the voice of the dead person in your dream means that you feel overwhelmed by your many responsibilities. It may be time to take a break, recharge your energy and improve your mood to start again to achieve new achievements. Dreaming of a dead man screaming It symbolizes your generosity and kindness to others and shows that you are concerned about your appearance and appearance, but you feel separated from others. Your dream of a dead person screaming points to your subconscious mind and hidden thoughts and tells you that it is time to bring your thoughts out into the open. The dream also tells you that you should enjoy your life and leave work for a while. Dreaming of the deceased screaming loudly means that you will rise to a high level of fame and also tells you that your relationship with your lover is threatened, so you have to put more romance in your relationship. Dreaming of a dead person screaming means that despite the current problems or lack of success you may face, you will succeed in the future. Sometimes, a dream of the dead screaming suggests regret for your hasty decisions and suggests that you are suffering from a lack of support or strength, and tells you that you need to divide your problems into smaller, more manageable sizes. Dreaming of the dead screaming is a sign of temporary bad luck and misery that ends after a short period of time. Your dream also means that you are suffering from some restrictions because of some people in your life. Perhaps there is someone who is imposing their views on you or forcing you to do something. The interpretation of the dead screaming in a dream for a man Seeing a dead person screaming in a man's dream is evidence of the death of someone close to you, and generally, the screaming of a dead person indicates that he will face problems in his source of livelihood. Seeing a person screaming and then stopping screaming means that good will come to you and that you will make great progress in your work. Seeing the dead screaming in a dream, if the dreamer is suffering from an illness, it means healing by the grace of God. The interpretation of the dead screaming in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a dead person screaming in a pregnant woman's dream in general, if the dead person is smiling in the dream, it means that the birth will be safe without facing any health problems. But if the deceased screamed and his face frowned, this is a sign that he is facing health problems during pregnancy. If you see that the dead person has stopped screaming, it means that God will ...
